de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms

Interface Searchable<T extends LibraryMedia<? extends AbstractMediaNumber>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of objects that can be searched for
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SLNPClient

    public interface Searchable<T extends LibraryMedia<? extends AbstractMediaNumber>>
    Interface describes default methods to search media in LMS.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T lookupMedia(java.lang.String id)
      Returns a library media object from the LMS specified by the ID or null if no corresponding object was found by the LMS
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T> searchMedia(java.lang.String signature)
      Returns a map of library media objects from the LMS found by the string, indexed by the media signature.

    • Method Detail

      • lookupMedia

        T lookupMedia(java.lang.String id)
       throws LMSException
        Returns a library media object from the LMS specified by the ID or null if no corresponding object was found by the LMS
        Parameters:
        id - the unique ID to perform a lookup for
        Returns:
        a library media object or null
        Throws:
        LMSException - if a exception occurred in the LMS back-end while looking up the media

      • searchMedia

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T> searchMedia(java.lang.String signature)
                                       throws LMSException
        Returns a map of library media objects from the LMS found by the string, indexed by the media signature. The signature supports wildcard pattern.
        Parameters:
        signature - the string to perform a search for
        Returns:
        a map of library media objects
        Throws:
        LMSException - if a exception occurred in the LMS back-end while searching for the media
